body_html:
@ilblackdragon Thank you for the reviews, I am quite new to C++, and I wasn't even aware that a useful tool like clang-format exists, sorry for the potential headaches I may have caused.
As for the code duplication problem, I have some rough ideas on how to improve it, but it's quite late over here, so I will work on this tomorrow.

body:
@ilblackdragon Thank you for the reviews, I am quite new to C++, and I wasn't even aware that a useful tool like clang-format exists, sorry for the potential headaches I may have caused. 
As for the code duplication problem, I have some rough ideas on how to improve it, but it's quite late over here, so I will work on this tomorrow.
